page.title: 14QUADRING GUIDES
page.content: The 1st St. Margaret's, Quadring,Guides Company was set up in the year of the Queen's Jubilee by Mrs.S. Hosie. She had originally transported girls to Donington for Guiding activities. Girls from the age of ten up to fouteen are eligible to join. They follow an eight point plan covering such things as keeping fit, home-making,giving sevice, getting to know people,enjoying the outdoors,thinking for themselves,exploring the arts and following the Guide Law. The guides put on a show for the Old people each year and go on an annual camp to various places. The Guides meet every Friday either at St. Margaret's Church Hall or at Mrs. Hosie's home.
